data.message: IF YOU #LOVERECYCLING THEN MAKE YER BOTTLES FROM RECYCLED PLASTIC IN THE FIRST PLACE. EEJITS.

replies.message: Hi Natalie, currently we use 25% recycled plastic and have committed to doubling the amount by 2020. We’d like to use more but there’s not enough recycled plastic in the UK at the moment, we need more bottles to be recycled. This is why as part of our strategy we will be seeking reform of the recycling system in the UK to improve recovery and recycling rates.
